creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: large kettle with two details cut in sides, lion head-shaped ring holders on either side, cut-out decoration along top lip; supports a smaller, squat, cast teapot with wide open mouth; small reddish lid; two detachable iron rings; ceramic scoop; wooden coaster
markings: impressed relief seal lower center of scoop
title: Portable brazier and kettle
